title: test user authentication and role based access control
description: Verify that the user authentication system correctly authenticates users and enforces role-based access control to prevent unauthorized data access.

title: test natural language query processing in portuguese
description: Test the system's ability to accurately process and respond to natural language queries in Portuguese, ensuring at least 95% accuracy in responses.

title: test real time data querying from sql server
description: Validate that the API correctly queries real-time business data from the SQL Server and returns accurate results.

title: test dynamic data visualization generation
description: Ensure that the API generates dynamic visualizations such as charts and tables correctly based on user queries and supports interactive features like filtering and sorting.

title: test secure session management
description: Check that user sessions are securely managed, including session creation, expiration, and protection against unauthorized access.

title: test administrator monitoring and management interfaces
description: Verify that administrator APIs provide access to monitoring dashboards, pipeline health status, and user and role management functionalities.

title: test logging and error tracking system
description: Ensure that the logging API captures all critical events and errors accurately and provides comprehensive audit trails.

title: test backend api query processing
description: Validate that the backend API correctly processes user queries, integrates with LangGraph and OpenAI models, and returns appropriate responses.

title: test data pipeline status and update api
description: Test the API responsible for monitoring and updating the data pipeline status, ensuring data is correctly extracted, transformed, and loaded.

title: test system performance and scalability under load
description: Assess the API's ability to maintain performance and availability under increased user load and data volume, meeting the specified uptime and response time criteria.
